section_title: APPROVAL OF THE DRAFT REPORT OF THE 41ST SESSION
sentences: On Monday morning, Acting IPCC Chair El Gizouli and Acting IPCC Secretary Stewart presented the draft report of IPCC-41 (IPCC-XLII/Doc.3).

Venezuela recalled the compromise that followed their acceptance to increase group representation for Regions I (Africa) and II (Asia) at IPCC-41 given the lack of time for further consultations, which was conditional on consideration of a similar revision of Region III (South America) during the next assessment cycle.
The Panel accepted the report, with Venezuela’s intervention included as an annex to the report.
enb_long_title: 42nd Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC-42)
